name: RiddleQuiz
0:
”Alexa open riddle quiz game”
”start quiz”
”end quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: riddle quiz game
Developer Terms of Use
des: Riddle quiz skill which is created to put your knowledge to the test with this fantastic question set in the form of quiz. In line with our aim to expose user to various spheres of knowledge we had made this skill. Here we have added more than 60 riddle in this skill. It randomly choose 5 question from the set of riddles. And the user has to answer it. It start with invocation name riddle quiz game and then for start the quiz just say start or start quiz. First question will be asked. User can say both answer or options. It checks for the answer if answer is correct applause audio will be played and for wrong answer buzzer will be played. After 5 questions user will get to know how many question are correct from 5 questions. To end the quiz just say end or stop quiz.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
